channel.title: I Need Help Agian! A Few Things! Help Pleaseeeeeeeeeeeee
channel.description:
[shadow=red,left][u][b]PROBLEM ONE[/b][/u][/shadow] I've been trying to change my speed of weapons but it appears to me that no matter how much i change the WepDelay and PkingDelay , I log on and attack an npc and its the same speed, Does anyone know why OR what would be really helpful is could anyone post all the weapon speeds the same as RS, Would really appreciate it
[shadow=red,left][u][b]PROBLEM TWO[/b][/u][/shadow] My server, like most other servers, is based in the dummies of Varrock. However i want my server to be based in edgeville so it will be like realistic pking. But i don't know how to move the NPC's to edge or how to change your respawning point. Anyone send links or Post what i have to search for etc. Would be really helpful.
Thanks!

item.title: I Need Help Agian! A Few Things! Help Pleaseeeeeeeeeeeee
item.dc:creator: @Zanzibar Zanzibar
item.description:
@Zanzibar wrote:

Answer 2 :

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

Change The Number Next To NpcID And CoordX
EX:

spawn = 2745	2375	5068	0	3104	5068	3104	5068	1	Jad

Changes Into

spawn = 2745	2380	5075	0	3104	5068	3104	5068	1	Jad

Jad’s First Coords Were X=2375 and Y =5068
I Moved It To X=2380 Y=5075

To Change The Starting Point, Open Player.Java And Search Coordinates.
Under, You Should See Something Like teleportToX = 3254;//3072; teleportToY = 3420;//3312;
Change The FIRST Number After The = Signs

To Change The Respawn Point After Someone Dies You Open Client.Java

Find Public Void youdied
Look Towards The End Of That Void, It Should Look Like eleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420; //pEmote = 15; //pWalk = 13; sendMessage("Oh dear you died!"); hitDiff = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
Change The Number After The ='s Sign For Only teleportToX = 3254; teleportToY = 3420;
Change It To Your Starting Point

If Its Not Clear Then… Tell Me That It’s Not Clear…

Read full topic
item.source: I Need Help Agian! A Few Things! Help Pleaseeeeeeeeeeeee
